alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 27 at 3:27AM HST until February 27 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI...NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI...AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .A large west-northwest swell has begun to gradually subside, yet remains high enough to sustain advisory level surf along exposed north and west facing shores today. Surf heights will drop below advisory thresholds later tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai; and 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores of Maui. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai; and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate...Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
